### Load some packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Get the data

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Get the Data

# Or read in the data manually

broadband <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-05-11/broadband.csv')
```

### Understanding the data

```{r}
head(broadband)
broadband$availability <- as.numeric(broadband$`BROADBAND AVAILABILITY PER FCC`)
```

```{r}
mean(broadband$availability, na.rm=TRUE)
```
